places.title: Tito's Alitas Adictivas
places.description: Possibly the restaruant with the best chicken tenders that I've tried in my whole life. With a number of restaruants around the city, Tito's is mainly known as a fast food restaurant, having boneless, chicken tenders and hamburgers and their main dishes.
places.personal_opinion: The most popular plate they have is called Special Tenders, which consists in a bed of fries with three chicke tenders on top dipped in ranch, BBQ and Habanero sauces.

places.title: Feelgrow
places.description: Located in the hearth of Monterrey, Feelgrow is an italian restaurant that is on what can e considered as the most touristic place in Monterrey: Barrio Antiguo (or Old Neighborhood. The restaurant is mostly known for their food and live music.
places.personal_opinion: The perfect place for a romantic evening. This is the official date restaurant to celebrate special occasions for me and my girlfriend and I can asure you, It won't let you down. The low-light ambient and live music is really something magical to see
